title: Beautiful luxury house @ Hokandara Road, Thalawathugoda
details:
Architecturally designed modern three storied house for sale @ Hokandara, Thalawathugoda
Spacious sitting and dinning area
TV lobby
Four bed rooms with attached bathrooms
Modern fitted pantry
Wet kitchen
Servant room and wash room
Roof terrace
Landscaped garden
High quality fittings, brick walls
Roller shutter gate for double parking
Facing 20 ft wide road
High residential, calm and quiet area
